actions.description: These actions will be executed one after the other (but in the same tick).
actions.markdownDescription: These actions will be executed one after the other (but in the same tick).

type.description:
[Meta Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/and)

Executes all provided actions in order.

Type ID: `origins:and`
type.markdownDescription:
[Meta Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/and)

Executes all provided actions in order.

Type ID: `origins:and`

action.description: The action which might be executed.
action.markdownDescription: The action which might be executed.

chance.description: The chance that the action will execute, from 0 to 1. (E.g. 0.1 means 10% chance, 0.95 means 95% chance).
chance.markdownDescription: The chance that the action will execute, from 0 to 1. (E.g. 0.1 means 10% chance, 0.95 means 95% chance).

fail_action.description: The action to execute if the specified action in the `action` field is not executed.
fail_action.markdownDescription: The action to execute if the specified action in the `action` field is not executed.

type.description:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Executes the provided action only with a specific chance.

Type ID: `origins:chance`
type.markdownDescription:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Executes the provided action only with a specific chance.

Type ID: `origins:chance`

actions.description: Each object has to have an `element` [Action](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/choice) and a `weight` [Integer](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/choice).
actions.markdownDescription: Each object has to have an `element` [Action](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/choice) and a `weight` [Integer](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/choice).

type.description:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Executes one of the provided actions, choosing randomly based on the assigned weights. The actions with higher weight values are more likely to be chosen.

Type ID: `origins:choice`

!!! note

    The chance of the object is determined by dividing the weight of the object to the sum of all weights of all the objects (`weight / sumOfAllWeights = chance`).
type.markdownDescription:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Executes one of the provided actions, choosing randomly based on the assigned weights. The actions with higher weight values are more likely to be chosen.

Type ID: `origins:choice`

!!! note

    The chance of the object is determined by dividing the weight of the object to the sum of all weights of all the objects (`weight / sumOfAllWeights = chance`).

action.description: The action which will be executed after the delay.
action.markdownDescription: The action which will be executed after the delay.

ticks.description: The amount of ticks until the action is executed.
ticks.markdownDescription: The amount of ticks until the action is executed.

type.description:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Executes the provided action after a set amount of ticks.

Type ID: `origins:delay`

!!! caution

    Delaying an action for more than a few ticks is not recommended! This meta action type is not reliable for such task.

    If you want to delay an action type *reliably,* you can use a power that would use the [Cooldown (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/delay) and trigger that power with the [Trigger Cooldown (Entity Action Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/delay).

    You can then use another power that would use the [Action Over Time (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/delay) and check if the value of the power that would use the [Cooldown (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/delay) is `"=="` to `0` using the [Resource (Entity Condition Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/delay).
type.markdownDescription:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Executes the provided action after a set amount of ticks.

Type ID: `origins:delay`

!!! caution

    Delaying an action for more than a few ticks is not recommended! This meta action type is not reliable for such task.

    If you want to delay an action type *reliably,* you can use a power that would use the [Cooldown (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/delay) and trigger that power with the [Trigger Cooldown (Entity Action Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/delay).

    You can then use another power that would use the [Action Over Time (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/delay) and check if the value of the power that would use the [Cooldown (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/delay) is `"=="` to `0` using the [Resource (Entity Condition Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/delay).

condition.description: A condition based on the type of action.
condition.markdownDescription: A condition based on the type of action.

if_action.description: The action which is executed when the condition evaluates to true.
if_action.markdownDescription: The action which is executed when the condition evaluates to true.

else_action.description: If present, this action will be executed when the condition evaluates to false.
else_action.markdownDescription: If present, this action will be executed when the condition evaluates to false.

type.description:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Executes an action only if a condition holds, and optionally executes another action when it doesn't hold.

Type ID: `origins:if_else`

!!! note

    Depending on the condition type, a different action type is expected:

    Action Type | Condition Type
    ------------|----------------
    [Bi-entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else) | [Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else)
    [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else) | [Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else)
    [Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else) | [Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else)
    [Item Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else) | [Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else)
type.markdownDescription:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Executes an action only if a condition holds, and optionally executes another action when it doesn't hold.

Type ID: `origins:if_else`

!!! note

    Depending on the condition type, a different action type is expected:

    Action Type | Condition Type
    ------------|----------------
    [Bi-entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else) | [Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else)
    [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else) | [Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else)
    [Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else) | [Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else)
    [Item Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else) | [Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else)

actions.description: Each object has to have an `action` [Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list) object and a `condition` [Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list) object.
actions.markdownDescription: Each object has to have an `action` [Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list) object and a `condition` [Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list) object.

type.description:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Checks a list of actions associated with conditions, and executes the first one in the list for which the condition holds. Basically a less indentation-heavy way to represent a deeply nested [If-Else (Meta Action Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list).

Type ID: `origins:if_else_list`

!!! note

    Depending on the condition type, a different action type is expected:
    
    Action Type | Condition Type
    ------------|----------------
    [Bi-entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list) | [Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list)
    [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list) | [Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list)
    [Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list) | [Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list)
    [Item Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list) | [Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list)
type.markdownDescription:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Checks a list of actions associated with conditions, and executes the first one in the list for which the condition holds. Basically a less indentation-heavy way to represent a deeply nested [If-Else (Meta Action Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list).

Type ID: `origins:if_else_list`

!!! note

    Depending on the condition type, a different action type is expected:
    
    Action Type | Condition Type
    ------------|----------------
    [Bi-entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list) | [Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list)
    [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list) | [Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list)
    [Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list) | [Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/if_else_list)

type.description:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Does nothing. Can be used as a backup in case an action is not optional in some place.

Type ID: `origins:nothing`
type.markdownDescription:
[Meta Action Type](../meta_action_types.md)

Does nothing. Can be used as a backup in case an action is not optional in some place.

Type ID: `origins:nothing`

side.description: Determines where to execute the specified action type. Accepts `"client"` or `"server"`
side.markdownDescription: Determines where to execute the specified action type. Accepts `"client"` or `"server"`

type.description:
[Meta Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/side)

Executes the specified action type on the specified "side".
type.markdownDescription:
[Meta Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/side)

Executes the specified action type on the specified "side".

type.description: Block Action Types operate an action at a selected block or set of blocks. These are available to power/action types that provides a `block_action` object field.
type.markdownDescription: Block Action Types operate an action at a selected block or set of blocks. These are available to power/action types that provides a `block_action` object field.
